body_html: Yes, I did use the tf.train.Supervisor, but the job may not be running for 600 seconds. Are the checkpoints stored on the server side? I didn't see any checkpoints stored on my local machine (where I did see the summary files) without explicitly call sv.saver.save
body_text: Yes, I did use the tf.train.Supervisor, but the job may not be running for 600 seconds. Are the checkpoints stored on the server side? I didn't see any checkpoints stored on my local machine (where I did see the summary files) without explicitly call sv.saver.save
body: Yes, I did use the `tf.train.Supervisor`, but the job may not be running for 600 seconds. Are the checkpoints stored on the server side? I didn't see any checkpoints stored on my local machine (where I did see the summary files) without explicitly call `sv.saver.save`
